programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: How gangs are managed in the jail system; how family relationships affect the jail experience.

programme.title: Lockup: Grand Rapids: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate with a record dating back to age 14 comes to terms with his past and present; another inmate is left cut and bleeding after he is caught off guard during a vicious assault inside the Kent County Jail.

programme.title: Lockup: Grand Rapids: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Behind the circular walls of Kent County Jail an inmate tries to leave jail the hard way; a female inmate convicted of her fifth drunken driving charge could lose everything; an outcast inmate makes a comment that sparks both violence and panic.

programme.title: Lockup: Grand Rapids: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A gangbanger squares off with his victim's family in court and with another inmate inside the jail; the Kent County Jail staff must deal with a former colleague gone bad.

programme.title: Lockup: Grand Rapids: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Behind the razor wire topped fences and brick walls of the Kent County Jail an inmate worker deals with the pressure of trying to create the jail's most popular dish; a pair of incarcerated lovers might end up having another mouth to feed.

programme.title: Lockup: Grand Rapids: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A young inmate with a big personality faces problems while four other inmates are in jail after a shocking home invasion robbery and rape; one defendant will stand apart from the others, though nothing will prepare him for what's to come.

programme.title: Lockup: Grand Rapids: Extended Stay
programme.desc: In Kent County Jail, a well-known inmate is back with more than 130 prior stays; an inside look at life in the one wing of the jail that inmates consider prime real estate, but where one will be expelled for good.

programme.title: Lockup: Fairfax: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The communities in Fairfax County, Virginia, have become some of the wealthiest and fastest growing in the nation, due in part to low crime rates, and, as one deputy says, taking care of the "little things" so "you don't have the big things."

programme.title: Lockup: Fairfax: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A self-described white supremacist may not be who he says he is and that could make him a marked man among other white supremacists; another inmate attempts to hide the true nature of his recent conviction.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: How gangs are managed in the jail system; how family relationships affect the jail experience.

programme.title: Lockup: Grand Rapids: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate with a record dating back to age 14 comes to terms with his past and present; another inmate is left cut and bleeding after he is caught off guard during a vicious assault inside the Kent County Jail.

programme.title: Lockup: Charleston: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate finds himself at the center of more than one battle, and he traces his problems back to the real-life nightmare that haunts his family; a young new arrival faces a charge of reckless homicide.

programme.title: Lockup: Charleston: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A young woman finds love in the jail's one co-ed housing unit; another inmate, charged with a spree of armed robberies, now comes under investigation inside the jail; a father speaks for his son, who if found guilty, could face the death penalty.

programme.title: Lockup: Charleston: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The survivor of a vicious attack shares his story in the hopes that other inmates will never commit such violence; for another inmate, it's too late to turn back the clock and now the pain of incarceration has begun to take a toll.

programme.title: Lockup: Charleston: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An agitated inmate takes severe measures to get staff's attention; a young first-timer is found unconscious in his cell; another inmate garners "enemy status" within the jail.

programme.title: Lockup: Charleston: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The jail's Special Operations Group is called in to deal with a difficult inmate; a well-known inmate returns to jail, but this time, he's in with his girlfriend, who might be harboring a secret that could dramatically affect both their lives.

programme.title: Lockup: Charleston: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A fight breaks out over snacks but officers want to know if there was something else behind it; an open transgender inmate, who "escorts" on the street, chooses general population over protective custody; an inmate is found dead in his bunk.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: Three unforgettable inmates, each one about to cross the threshold to freedom; witness their joys, their fears, their triumphs and discover that sometimes the only thing tougher than being in prison, is staying out.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: Solitary confinement is one of the most common methods for disciplining inmates, but it's also a very controversial issue.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: Addiction leads prisoners to serious crime to fuel their habits.
